definition: to be precisely the same/to be no different
as/as if/such as

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to remove/to withdraw
rut/track/rhyme/(dialect) way/method

sentences.english: But the origins of our problem are pretty much the same.
sentences.chinese: 但是，当前问题的根源却几乎是如出一辙。

sentences.english: In this regard regulators are ploughing the same furrow as before.
sentences.chinese: 在这个方面，监管者的表现与以往如出一辙。

sentences.english: Hu Xuebing can use gypsum as skillfully as his ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 胡学兵对于石膏的纯熟运用和他的祖先如出一辙。

sentences.english: This is the story of hardships known Gou same.
sentences.chinese: 这与家喻户晓的勾践卧薪尝胆的典故如出一辙。

sentences.english: The '09 Geely GE body design is no doubt a knock-off of the Rolls Royce Phantom.
sentences.chinese: 09款吉利GE的车身设计与劳斯莱斯幻影如出一辙。

sentences.english: Charless scored again, with an exact duplicate of his first goal.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯再次得分，与第一次破门如出一辙。

sentences.english: Operate exactly the same with the map search.
sentences.chinese: 操作起来跟地图搜索时如出一辙。

sentences.english: Another doctor Zhiyang has been murdered, and the crime scene is exactly the same as that of Xiong Zhong's.
sentences.chinese: 又一医生智扬被杀害，凶杀现场和祥忠的如出一辙。

sentences.english: Today, he to your enticement also with beforehand being exactly the same.
sentences.chinese: 今天，他对你的诱惑也跟以前的如出一辙。

definition: exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
to resemble/similar/like/resemblance/similarity
different tunes played with equal skill (idiom)/different methods leading to the same result/different approach but equally satisfactory outcome
to reprint/reproduction/pirate copy/(fig.) imitation/carbon copy/clone
not at all the same/substantially different
widely different/utterly different
to resemble one another/to be alike/similar
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
entirely different/different as black and white
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
virtually the same/differing only on small points
mirroring others/identical
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
similar
accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
